CMSRI Wins Award for Outstanding Research on Dangers of Vaccination

For many years, the Children’s Medical Safety Research Institute (CMSRI) has been tirelessly campaigning about the dangers of vaccination. Their research is second to none, and they have helped fund studies conducted by some of world’s leading scientists and researchers, ensuring that children from around the world have a far safer future to look forward […]
